title: LoL client black screen after matches
body:
Hello,
When I complete a match, I get a black screen, instead of the post match lobby. 
Is anyone experiencing something similar to this? I am not sure what bug is causing this. It's annoying that I have to re log in after every match.

Also, the invites won't properly display unless I play around with the LoL client, trying to get it selectable.

replies.body:
It sounds like you're experiencing an overall *poor connection* to the PvP.net service, which ties with social and matchmaking services. I'd recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local network settings are compatible with League before we investigate further.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
